attributes.action: make the meat from cattle slaughtered because of the foot and mouth outbreak available for domestic human consumption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Meat from cattle infected with foot and mouth disease offers no known health risk to humans. While this produce may be considered unfit for export, wrongly, in my opinion, it should not be allowed to go to waste. There are plenty of people who cannot afford the luxury of quality British beef and would welcome the opportunity to sit down to a free Sunday roast. Why not?
